name: Layton's Mystery Journey - Katrielle and the Millionaires' Conspiracy [3DS]
description:
solve mysteries and original puzzles! Fashion-conscious players can also
redecorate the agency and dress Katrielle in various outfits to suit the
case at hand. With the most puzzles ever included in a Layton game, a
colorful new cast, and an intriguing storyline that includes seven
millionaires and one whopper of a conspiracy, will she ever be able to
find her missing father?
